Action.description: The action taken on a package within a tenant. The options are: Added Removed

ActionDate.description: The date the action was taken.

AppExchangeReady.description: Indicates whether the package has passed AppExchange review.

DetailIdentifier.description: The ID of the individual detail record. This field is unique within your org.

InstalledBy.description: The user that installed the package.

MetricIdentifier.description: The ID of the type of metric that was counted.

MetricsType.description: The type of data being collected.

Name.description: The name of the metric for which data is being collected.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix associated with the package.

PackageName.description: The name of the package being added to or removed from the tenant.

Publisher.description: The name of the publisher that created the package.

ReleaseStatus.description: The release status of the package. The options are: Beta Released

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant that the package was added to or removed from.

TenantName.description: The name of the tenant that the package was added to or removed from.

Version.description: The current version of the package.
